entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Brampton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:38 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 11:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to light snow before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
